title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the AstroMiningPlanner system, including stakeholder needs, system constraints, functional specifications, and non-functional requirements (e.g., performance, security, scalability, and maintainability). Ensure the requirements cover all aspects of asteroid mining operations, including resource identification, extraction strategies, resource transportation, resource processing, and any other relevant areas. Involve subject matter experts and stakeholders from various domains, such as astronomy, geology, mining engineering, and space logistics, to gather comprehensive requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the AstroMiningPlanner system, including subsystems, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop Resource Identification Module
description: Implement the module responsible for identifying and analyzing potential asteroid resources.

title: Develop Extraction Planning Module
description: Implement the module responsible for planning and optimizing asteroid resource extraction strategies.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the AstroMiningPlanner system, including data visualization and user interaction components.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for the AstroMiningPlanner, including databases and data pipelines.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures for the AstroMiningPlanner system, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the AstroMiningPlanner system, including automated testing and deployment processes.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing of the AstroMiningPlanner system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.
dependencies: Set up Data Storage and Management

title: Write Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the AstroMiningPlanner system, including user guides, technical specifications, and maintenance manuals.
